text:
Lyft | San Francisco, Seattle, NYC | ONSITE, FULL-TIME

It matters how you get there! Hiring senior positions across the board: iOS, Android, backend Python, Go, frontend React, data science. At this time focusing on candidates with >4 years professional experience. Sorry, summer intern spots are already taken! Hit me up if you have any questions. Resumes to aderewecki@lyft.com.
